prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

Promptbook is a project aimed at revolutionizing software development by enabling the creation of AI applications using plain human language. It represents a shift from traditional programming languages to a more accessible approach that both humans and machines can understand and execute.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook, AI applications, human language, software development, programming languages, accessibility
